extension.dc:title: Trait measurement experiment (v20120911)
extension.dc:description: The Darwin Core extension for genebanks (DwC germplasm) was developed in 2009 for sharing genebank datasets with the GBIF Integrated Publishing Toolkit from the Global Biodiversity Information Facility (GBIF). This application schema includes the terms to describe the experiments to collect trait measurements or so-called Characterization and Evaluation (C and E) data. These terms where largely developed by the EPGRIS3 group of the European Coopertive Programme for Plant Genetic Resources (ECPGR) in 2009.
extension.name: MeasurementExperiment

property.name: measurementExperimentID
property.dc:description: Persistent identifier used to identify a trait measurement experiment.

property.name: measurementExperimentIdentifier
property.dc:description: Unique number in the dataset for the experiment.
property.examples: Local identifier for the experiment or project activity

property.name: measurementExperimentYear
property.dc:description: The year when the trait experiment was conducted.

property.name: measurementExperimentReport
property.dc:description: A reference to the report of the experiment, either supplied as the file name or the URL of the report.

property.name: measurementExperimentRemarks
property.dc:description: Information relevant for the interpretation of the scores in the experiment.
property.examples: Experimental design, location, experimentor, weather, etc
